content:
january  

House Representative John Shimkus RIll. will be visiting Charleston to meet with constituents Tuesday according to a press release from his office PERIOD



Residents of the fifteenth district can meet with Shimkus from  p.m PERIOD Residents can make an appointment by calling his office but walkups are welcome PERIOD

These are oneonone meetings in order to give individuals privacy and allow them to speak honestly and open about their concern with me Shimkus said in a press release PERIOD

Shimkus said he uses these meetings to interact with voters who are facing problems with either the government or the bills that have appeared on the congressional docket for the upcoming term PERIOD

In these sessions I get to hear personally from people about the problems they are facing in dealing with the federal government or hear their positions on issues that I am voting on Shimkus said PERIOD

He has served in the U.S PERIOD House since  and will be up for election in the Nov PERIOD midterms PERIOD In addition to his role in the legislature he also serves as a delegate to the NATO Parliamentary Assembly a forum that discusses security issues that face states that are members of the alliance PERIOD

He also served on the Committee on Energy and Commerce where he has spoken in support of the coal industry PERIOD Shimkus also spoke in  in support of the Keystone Pipeline a crude oilline that would bring Canadian tar sands across the Midwest and through Illinois PERIOD
